attributes.action: Cross border hiring is dangerous to the public. Sub-contracting is no better.
attributes.additional_details:
By inserting the word Predominantly into the Laws from both the Deregulation Act 2015 and the previous out of date laws, this would close the loop holes currently being used for drivers who circumvent the licensing system and the operators who use these drivers.

The changes to the Taxi & Private Hire were questioned when this Act went through Parliament, the 10 days given to debate was on reason.

The whole act was not consulted correctly, we can not let the public be in danger due to this.
attributes.background: ALPHA and the GMB have UNITED to bring to the attention of the government the issues within the Taxi & Private Hire trade from the Deregulation Act.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
